title: Was George Soros a special forces officer or Nazi collaborator during World War II?
subtitle: Despite politically motivated rumours on the contrary, the left billionaire George Soros was neither in the SS nor a Nazi collaborator in the Second World War.
author: David Emery
vclaim: During the Second World War, George Soros was a member of SS (a Nazi paramilitary organization) or Nazi cooperative who helped to confiscate property from Jews.
